title: Dairy and Frozen Department Associate
description: Provide prompt customer service, assist with accessibility issues, ensuring a positive shopping experience.
Implemented quality control measures by regularly inspecting and removing expired or near-expired items, maintaining high product standards.
Fostered teamwork in a fast-paced environment, coordinating with colleagues to efficiently restock shelves and maintain product availability.
Meticulously monitored product freshness, ensuring compliance with food safety standards. Optimized product placement for maximum visibility
Provided exceptional customer service, addressing inquiries and resolving issues promptly. Assisted customers with special dietary needs, enhancing shopping experience.

title: Dishwasher
description: Collected, washed, dried and organized dishes, glasses, silverware, and other tableware  used by guests and staff.
Organized and prepared plates for service.
Supported kitchen staff by assisting with various tasks, fostering a team-oriented environment and contributing to overall operational efficiency.
Maintained impeccable cleanliness standards in kitchen areas, directly contributing to health and safety compliance and positive customer experiences.
Embraced additional responsibilities beyond core role, demonstrating adaptability and commitment to personal growth within the food service industry.

title: Volunteer
company: Father John Kelly Catholic Elementary School
description: Worked as a volunteer for the school's Core Resource program.
Tutored students with disabilities, enhancing their academic performance and fostering an inclusive learning environment.
Partnered with teachers to develop tailored learning strategies, improving student engagement and comprehension.
Actively participated in the Core Resource program, contributing to the school's mission of providing quality education for all.
Mentored students with diverse learning needs, fostering academic growth and inclusivity in the Core Resource program.
